title: Feel like im getting hacked.
body: SO right now my League of Legends account has been permanently suspended, because riot thinks that my account has been comprised.   Now i wrote a letter to Riot, and in return when someone finally got back to me, they have been asking me for me ip, my credit card number. I feel like someone is trying to take all of my information, is this routine? Or am I being completely catfished?

replies.body: Our account recovery team will only restore account if they're absolutely sure it's being sent to the owner.  They do ask a series of questions to help with this verification.  I do see you're currently speaking with MarledFox to get this resolved.  Continue working with him, and he'll help you out!
Is he going to get back to me anytime? Its' been 2 days since anyone has last replied to me...
yeh why tf would you send a letter LOL who even sends letters anymore LOL
If your account has been compromised you have to submit a ticket, don't send a letter to them. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=38154
